body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Dashboard
  • Top Hospital Report
    • The Top Hospital Report has been added to Competitive Dashboard.
    • The dashboard view is the top five Networks and the top ten Hospitals by bed count in one chart, with a check mark if the hospital is in the network.
    • The detail view is broken down by the geographic grouping defined in the report criteria. Each geographic grouping includes a table with all networks defined in the report criteria in rows, sorted according to the sort order defined, and the top 10 hospitals in columns, highest to lowest by bed count.
    • A check mark indicates if the hospital is in the network.
    • The Hospital name is a link to profile.
  • Top Network Market Penetration
    • Removed labels from graph for a cleaner view.
    • Reduced bubble size to minimize overlapping bubbles.
    • Note: The user is still able to view the network names, counts and percentages by hovering the bubbles or referring to the table below the graph.
Competitive Access
  • Census file zip code limit
    • The limit in place for the number of unique zip codes in an upload has increased from 5,000 to 20,000.
  • Top Hospital tab modifications
    • The format of the Top Hospitals tables has been modified.
      • The Y axis is now Hospitals.
      • The X axis is now Networks.
    • The format modification allows for the Top Hospitals Report to be included in the export, even if more than four networks are included in the analysis.
